QuestData.Title: Worker's Rights
QuestData.Description:
Hey, you! You lookin' for work?
I ain't got a job for ya, but I can tell ya to stay away from Algerson Lumber!
Algerson'll promise ya some solid labor work and decent pay, but it's a lie I tell ya!
The conditions are terrible, we're gettin' attacked, and Algerson ain't even battin' an eye!
He don't care 'bout us little people. I'd stay away if I were you!
QuestData.LogDescription: Talk to Maynard Algerson at Algerson Lumber Yard.
QuestData.RewardText: Why hello! Welcome to Algerson Lumber. How may I help you?
